Text: Recent Gas Transportation Contract Cc Michelle Per our Transwestern transportation agreement North Start Steel would line to change our delivery point from PGE Topock POI on the Transwestern Pipeline to CPN South Point POI for mmbtu per day deliveries on or about May or sooner or later as soonest this point becomes operational This change will remain in effect through May gas day which is the duration of the transportation contract Sincerely Corny Boersma

Transwestern Pipeline Cc I dont think well be interested in this expansion Question what happens if you have more interest in the transport then the mday how do you allocate this transport Also we have the TW contract I am hving trouble structuring the gas deal the way we want Ill continue to get this finished and then we plan on signing the contract Corny Boersma Cargill Inc

RE Transwestern Transport ProposalThank you If we would rather not participate in Transwesterns sharing mechanism if we were to remarket the capacity Im assuming that this would be ok with you I dont think we would need this option Corny Original Message From mailto Sent Monday March PM To boersma corny hdqt Subject FW Transwestern Transport Proposal Written confirmation of phone conversation concerning offer for firm transport to PGE Topock Effective date to start ASAP Ending date to coincide with existing transport to North Star Steel at Kingman AZ Primary receipt at NSS to primary delivery at Topock Volume based on current available capacity of MMBtuday on Topock lateral Rate maximum demand from Transwesterns FERC Gas Tariff with applicable commodity fuel and surcharges Shipper retains Right of First Refusal Please call me with additional questions
